Claim: "A man is in front of a camera."
Implication: "A young man in a blue T-shirt and sweatpants stands over a stove and looks at the camera."
Referring expressions: Man, camera  Young man, blue T-shirt, sweatpants, stove, camera
Properties: IsInFrontOf(b,a)  IsYoung(c),   WearsBlueTShirt(d),   WearsSweatpants(e),   StandsOnStove(f),   LooksAtCamera(a)
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInFrontOf(b,a))) & (forall i (forall h (forall g ( IsInFrontOf(g,h) ->  IsYoung(i))))) & (forall j (forall k ( IsInFrontOf(j,k) ->    LooksAtCamera(k))))) -> (exists f (exists e (exists c (exists d (exists a ((IsYoung(c) and WearsBlueTShirt(d) and WearsSweatpants(e) and StandsOnStove(f)) and LooksAtCamera(a)))))))
